title: Uncle Si's Wild Ride
description:
Strap in for a wild ride, courtesy of one Si Robertson. All disclaimers apply. Check out Si's tale of Eagle the Twisted Pigeon, one of the funniest Bible-study pranks of all time, and how Si almost got Phillip killed. Si reveals why it took 12 hours to convince his fiery redhead to marry him and why he may need a psychiatrist — make that Si-cat-trist — for his 40-pound tomcat. Martin reveals who's building the duck calls now. John-David shocks everyone with the results of his Si fact-check. And if you're somehow still wondering: Si's not dead.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
